/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the scene. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, rise high into the sky, their windows reflecting the sunlight. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. The image beautifully encapsulates the vibrancy and energy of urban life in Beijing.
